note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
RESTdoclet is a Maven 2 plugin for generating RESTful service documentation from Spring 3 REST based Java web applications. The service documentation is extracted as a set of XML meta data files, which are then rendered by the RESTdoclet indexer web application which has been designed to be easily customisable for local deployments.

<SCREENSHOT>
name: RESTdoclet
tagline: A Maven plugin to generate JavaDoc-like interface specifications from Spring RESTful service annotations
